name: Norman's "Evil" Plan
description:
The game takes some time to load. Please be patient. Thank you :3

A Henry Stickmin Fangame.

Story:

Norman wants to blow up the "entire" planet. Bonnie and Co. are on their way to deactivate the bomb.

This game contains:

-38 Unique Fails!

-9 Achievements!

-4 Endings!

Hope you have fun trying to 100% this game. See ya on my next game :)
